creator: ant@untruth.org.uk
text:
Using 1.7 beta:
When you save 'HTTP Request' objects or 'HTTP Request Defaults' objects, the 
value of the last HTTP parameter in the list of params is not saved.  This is a 
bit annoying as you have to create a dummy parameter as the last item in the 
list, to preserve the values of all the real parameters.
(Still a very cool bit of software though).

There is an easy solution for you.  Read up on it in bug 5399.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5399 ***
creator: mstover1@apache.org

text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.
creator: jsalvata@atg.com
jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
